Empty_helmet: A staff widely enjoyed by wizards of the past, but for no particular reason.
column3: 예전에는 마법사들이 별 이유없이 좋아하던 형태의 지팡이입니다. {nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: It is presumably named after the place where its inventor came from.
column3: 이 활을 처음으로 고안한 사람의 출신지를 따라 명칭이 붙은 것으로 추측됩니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: The Quarrel Shooter Master uses this to teach beginners.
column3: 쿼렐슈터 마스터는 이것으로 입문자들을 지도합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Seasoned clerics attack the enemy in a multitude of ways using the ornament at the head of this mallet.
column3: 노련한 사제들은 끝부분의 장식을 다양한 방식으로 이용해 공격합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: A standard, military-issue weapon for common soldiers.
column3: 일반 병사들의 기본 병기이자 제식병기입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Alchemically crafted weapons are being re-evaluated and are trending with the resurgence of the monsters.
column3: 연금술로 제조된 무기들은 최근 몬스터들의 난동으로 재평가되는 추세입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Minivern's high defense becomes a great gift for crafters after it dies, like in this armor.
column3: 미니번의 방어력은 죽어서는 이렇게 큰 도움이 됩니다. {nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: A piece of armor that holds well over time and can used in different ways by those with the right know-how.
column3: 향상성이 좋고 요령을 아는 사람이라면 다양한 방법으로 활용하는 방어구입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Favored by those looking to achieve swift, precise movements.
column3: 민첩하면서 정확한 동작을 원하는 사람들이 자주 착용합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: If you wear them, you can see how little noise they make.
column3: 신어보면 소음이 적게 난다는 사실을 알 수 있습니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: The true power of this blade is its ability to cleave everything between you and your enemy.
column3: 당신과 적 사이를 갈라놓는 것이 이 검의 진정한 효용입니다. {nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: This sword has absorbed the experience of an elite soldier. Whether you are a mercenary or not, if you enjoy fighting you will appreciate this sword.
column3: 뛰어난 용병들의 실전 경험이 녹아든 형태의 검입니다. 비록 용병이 아니더라도 실전에 임하는 자라면 누구나 좋아하는 검입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: This weapon is a staff condensed with magic through complicated methods.
column3: 복잡한 의식을 거쳐 변화된 마력을 지팡이에 응축한 무기라고 합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: This staff symbolizes many virtues. Justice, truth, space and more.
column3: 보기보다 이 지팡이는 많은 미덕을 상징합니다. 정당성, 진리, 공간 등이 그 의미입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: The archers from the Astral Tower do not care for this bow. However, others living in these treacherous times might find this bow useful.
column3: 별의 탑의 궁수들은 이 활을 별로 좋아하지 않습니다. 그렇지만 요즘같이 험한 시대에는 다른 사람들에게는 필요할 것입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: In the old days, the majority of the body from this equipment was made by silver. The silver products were famous in Fedimian.
column3: 예전에는 몸체의 대부분을 은으로 만들었다고 합니다. 페디미안은 예전에는 은공예품으로도 유명했으니까 말입니다. {nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: It has a form to display the unique character of this town, but the material is not silver.
column3: 예전처럼 은으로 만들지는 않지만 도시 특유의 형태 감각은 충실히 반영된 모양을 지니고 있습니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: The Royal Army used it for the ceremony, but many warriors find it useful during real battles.
column3: 왕국군에서는 주로 의전용으로 사용했지만, 많은 전사들이 실전에서의 가치를 인정하는 창입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: After Partisan-style spears became popular, they started to be produced for the aristocracy, including this modified version.
column3: 파르티잔 양식의 창이 유행하면서 귀족령에서 제조되기 시작하자 이러한 변형 양식도 출현했습니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: The previous Skirmisher equipment is being crafted with improved qualities as the monsters go rampant since Medzio Diena.
column3: 기존의 스커미셔 장비가 신수의 날 이후  몬스터가 창궐함에 따라 향상된 성능으로 제작되고 있습니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: A normal sword regardless of the power with a magic. Of course, If there are people who ignore the power of this sword, they can be damaged by this sword.
column3: 지닌 바 위력에 상관없이 마력에 의지하지 않는 것은 평범한 검입니다. 물론 평범한 검이 지닌 위력을 무시하는 사람은 이 검에 변을 당할 가능성이 높습니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Don't you feel a foreboding presence from the enemy? It seems this isn't over yet.
column3: 상대에게 종말을 예감하게 만드는 그런 기운이 느껴지지 않습니까? 혹은 아직 안 끝났다는 기분도 들게 합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: According to the stories passed down through time, this staff was meant to possess a very powerful magic force. Its creator, however, passed away before they could imbue the magic in it, resulting in the state it has today.
column3: 전하는 바에 의하면 이 지팡이에는 본래 강한 마력이 부여될 예정이었답니다. 그러나 최초의 고안자는 이름만 붙이고 마력은 주지 못한 채 죽었고, 그래서 현재의 상태라고 합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: According to an old saying, the origin of the cane is related to the Demon Lord Helgasercle.
column3: 일설에 의하면 이 종류의 지팡이가 처음 만들어진 기원은 마군주 헬가 세르클과 관련이 있다고 합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Unlike its name, this bow will be welcomed by any archer. Rogues aren't the only ones who prefer this bow.
column3: 이름과 달리 궁사라면 누구에게나 환영받는 활입니다. 로그들만 좋아하지는 않습니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Careful attention of the user is necessary to avoid ruining the fine structure of this equipment. Its craftmenship adds a layer of complexity compared to regular weapons, which give credence to its value.
column3: 이 장비의 정밀한 구조를 망치지 않기 위해 사용자의 주의가 요구됩니다. 제조과정이 여느 무기보다 복잡하지만, 그만한 값어치가 있습니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Blacksmiths and those with another job often buy this to actually use it.
column3: 실제로는 대장장이나 다른 작업을 하는 사람들도 자주 구입하여 사용한다고 합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: If one feels that his weapon deals additional damages on the demons, that's just a feeling.
column3: 이 무기가 마족들에게 추가적인 피해를 주는 것 같다고 느낀다면 그것은 그냥 기분탓입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Even if multiple weapons share the same origin, some of them can develop further than the others.
column3: 동일한 기원을 지녀도 언제나 그보다 나은 발전을 이룬 무기가 나오기 마련입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: A simple piece of equipment to help you in combat.
column3: 전투에 도움을 주는 장비입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: This equipment was loved in the south of Orsha before Medzio Diena, and was used while hunting and traveling.
column3: 신수의 날 이전 오르샤 남쪽 지방에서 유행했던 양식으로 수렵용, 여행용으로 많이 사랑받았던 장비입니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: A necklace containing the blessing of Kupoles.
column3: 큐폴의 축복이 담겨져 있는 목걸이입니다. [큐폴 서버]에서만 사용 가능합니다.

Empty_helmet: A bracelet containing the blessing of Kupoles.
column3: 큐폴의 축복이 담겨져 있는 브레이슬릿입니다. [큐폴 서버]에서만 사용 가능합니다.

Empty_helmet: A cube obtained from the event. Right-click to use and obtain its contents.

Empty_helmet: {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar. You character must be level 15 or above to use.

마우스 오른쪽 버튼 클릭으로 사용합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Increases EXP gains, movement speed and maximum HP according to number of stacks for 30 minutes. Maximum 5 stacks.
column3: 30분간 중첩에 따라 경험치, 이동속도, 최대HP가 증가하며, 최대 5중첩까지 가능합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Install Goddess' Statue which provides Goddess's Blessing for five minutes.
column3: 5분 동안 여신의 축복을 받을 수 있는 여신의 조각상이 설치됩니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Used to enhance gems. Amplifies the EXP of gems.
column3: 젬을 강화시킬 때 사용합니다. 젬의 경험치를 대폭 올려줍니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Coloque um equipamento na bigorna e acerte-a para melhorar a qualidade do seu equipamento. Você pode refinar o equipamento sem o custo de Silver. {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar.
column3: 모루 위에 장비를 놓고 두드리면 성능이 향상됩니다. 실버 소비 없이 장비를 강화할 수 있습니다. 마우스 오른쪽 클릭으로 사용합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: [Level Up Event] Instance One Entry Voucher
Use it to enter an instanced dungeon one more time.
column3: 사용 시 인스턴스 던전과 의뢰소 미션에 1회 더 입장 가능합니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: [Level Up Event] Instanced Dungeon Reset Voucher
column3: [레벨업 이벤트] 인스턴스 던전 입장 횟수 초기화권

Empty_helmet: Use this to reset the instance entry restrictions for instanced dungeons and mercenary missions.
column3: 사용 시 인스턴스 던전과 의뢰소 미션의 입장 횟수가 초기화됩니다.{nl}9월 14일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: An unknown fragment. It's hard to tell what it can be used for, but it emits a faint magic.
column3: 정체를 알 수 없는 조각입니다. 어디에 사용하는 지 알 수 없지만 희미한 마력이 느껴집니다.

Empty_helmet: Increases +3 movement speed for 300 seconds. Effects apply only inside the Rancid Labyrinth, Balaam Camp Site and Michmas Temple. {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar. Cooldown of 60 seconds.

Empty_helmet: Increases +140 critical attack for 300 seconds. Effects apply only inside the Rancid Labyrinth, Balaam Camp Site and Michmas Temple. {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar. Cooldown of 60 seconds.
column3: 300초 동안 치명타 공격력을 +140 상승시켜줍니다. 해당 효과는 랜시드 미로, 밸러암 주둔지, 미크마쉬 사원에서만 유효합니다. 마우스 오른쪽 클릭으로 사용합니다. 재사용 대기시간 60초.

column3: 300초 동안 마법 증폭을 +130 상승시켜줍니다. 해당 효과는 랜시드 미로, 밸러암 주둔지, 미크마쉬 사원에서만 유효합니다. 마우스 오른쪽 클릭으로 사용합니다. 재사용 대기시간 60초.

Empty_helmet: There is magic actively flowing through this dagger.
column3: 마력이 흐르는 단검으로, 마력이 활성화된 상태입니다.

Empty_helmet: Increases +76 physical attack and +70 magic attack for 3 minutes. {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar. Cooldown time 180 seconds.
column3: 3분 동안 물리 공격력을 +76, 마법 공격력을 +70 상승시켜줍니다. 마우스 오른쪽 클릭으로 사용 가능합니다. 재사용 대기시간 180초.

Empty_helmet: Can only be used on equipment with 0 Potential. The equipment won't be destroyed upon failure. Does not require a silver fee for enhancement. When you fail at an enhance level of +12 or higher, it will reduce to +10. {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar.{nl} Pode ser trocado por medals in Loja de Trocas.
column3: 포텐셜이 0인 장비에만 사용가능 하며, 실패해도 장비가 파괴되지 않습니다. 강화시 실버가 필요하지 않습니다. 실패시 강화수치가 1 감소하며, +12 강화 이상에서 실패 시 강화 수치가 +10 강화로 감소합니다. 마우스 오른쪽 클릭으로 사용합니다.{nl} 리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환 가능합니다.

Empty_helmet: The meteorological phenomena most feared by ancient civilizations.{nl}Pode ser trocado por medals at the Loja de Trocas.

Empty_helmet: A headwear piece. {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar.{nl}Pode ser trocado por medals at the Loja de Trocas.

Empty_helmet: Use to receive a returning player quest.{nl}Completing the quest will earn you the corresponding rewards.

Empty_helmet: Coloque um equipamento na bigorna e acerte-a para melhorar a qualidade do seu equipamento. Após a falha, o nível de refino do equipamento não será reduzido.
Coloque um equipamento na bigorna e acerte-a para melhorar a qualidade do seu equipamento. Após a falha, o nível de refino do equipamento não será reduzido. Duração de 14 dias após a obtenção.
A title given to winners of the Spring Art Festival. {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar.
A scroll that lets the user transform.
Parece conter algo desconhecido. {nl}{nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar.{nl}Usável a partir do Lv. 40.
column3: 사용하면 무언가 알 수 없는 것을 획득할 수 있을 것 같습니다. 마우스 오른쪽 버튼 클릭으로 사용합니다.{nl}40 레벨부터 사용할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: Turn into a mystical forest fairy. Equip to change your appearance.

Empty_helmet: Um trevo de quatro folhas da sorte.
Um material para poções de recuperação de SP freqüentemente vendido por comerciantes em mercados.

column5: A herb that grows in sunny fields.
column6: 들판에서 자라나는 약초입니다.

Empty_helmet: Um material para poções de recuperação de HP freqüentemente vendido por comerciantes em mercados.
column3: HP 회복 포션제조에 사용되어 많은 상인들이 경매장을 통해 거래를 합니다.
column5: It tastes bad but restores your SP. {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar. Cooldown of 45 seconds.
column6: 맛은 좋지 않지만 SP를 회복시켜주는 효과가 있다. 마우스 오른쪽 클릭으로 사용합니다. 재사용 대기시간 45초.

Empty_helmet: Um pergaminho usado para gravar uma habilidade particular.
column3: 특정 스킬을 저장할 수 있는 주문서입니다.

column6: 다른 여신상으로 워프 이동을 시켜줍니다. 현재 위치는 기억됩니다.

Heart-throb wedding costume. Your appearance will change if you equip this.

My Wedding Tuxedo Costume. Your appearance will change if you equip this.

Instantly restores 50% of max. HP. Additionally restores the other 50% of HP every 2 seconds over 11 seconds. {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar. Cooldown of 20 seconds.{nl} Pode ser trocado por 2 Medalhas no Loja de Trocas.

Instantly restores 50% of max. SP. Additionally restores the other 50% of SP every 2 seconds over 11 seconds. {nl}{img mouseclick_right 30 30} para usar. Cooldown of 20 seconds.{nl} Pode ser trocado por 2 Medalhas no Loja de Trocas.

Use to play music. Cannot move while music is playing.
Use-o para tocar música. Não pode se mover enquanto a música está sendo reproduzida. Use o item novamente para parar a música. {nl} - Pode ser trocado por 20 medalhas no Loja de Trocas.

Empty_helmet: No one knows how Jukopus gave this weapon its abilities. The Winterspoon family seems to know, but do not share it.
column3: 유코푸스의 무엇이 이 목걸이에 능력을 부여하는지는 알려지지 않았습니다. 윈터스푼 가문에서는 아는 바가 있는 것 같지만 공개하지는 않고 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: The Fyrmes Necklace contains a small portion of divine power, which is the source of its greenish color. It also symbolizes the desire to never witness the end of our world as we know it.
The symbol engraved in the center is said to have evolved from an ancient rune. So much so, it is used by rune masters to teach their pupils.
The Mejstra Necklace was developed by a skilled master of dreams. It gives its wearer the ability to extract power from their dreams into reality.
The Svijes Necklace features the characteristics of the Fyrmes Necklace at a more developed level. In this necklace, the divine power has altered the nature of the piece itself.
The method use to create the first Atikha Necklace is known only in the northern regions of the Kingdom. It was merchants who discovered a way to produce them using easier to find materials.
Features the phrase, "Let the voice of the Goddess enter my heart, let it become my strength," engraved in very small lettering on the back.

The Lynnki Sit Necklace is known for imbuing its wearer with the power of its original owner, with the first owner gaining the power of the necklace's maker. Nothing is lost in this process, as the necklace merely adds the power of the previous owner to the current wearer, without taking any power away from those who come into contact with it.
This necklace was discovered by a maker looking for a way to equip two items at once. Considering its accidental discovery, the effects it possesses are quite extraordinary.
The body includes an engraved sentence claiming the origins of this piece in a shattered dagger owned by a goddess.

This necklace inherited the style of those created during the Kingdom's heydays. Currently, it assumes a more modern stance on that style, although its performance is lacking compared to the original pieces.
The Fyrmes Bracelet symbolizes an eternal cycle, represented by the looped metal rings. It is also a reminder of the will of the goddesses to banish the demons and their chaos.
According to merchant rumors, the fact that this piece possesses a single stat is the fault of a beginner's mistake.
The Mejstra Bracelet symbolizes the life added to an eternal cycle. Many were the makers who devoted themselves to maintaining the symbolism in this piece.

According to legends, the Svijes Bracelet was first created by a wizard known to have ventured into the realm of demons. After his body was discovered, the bracelet was the only way to confirm his identity.

When the Atikha Bracelet was first produced, the process of joining the two semicircles that compose it was very important. Today the bracelet is made from a single piece, which makes it more dangerous but easier to craft even by inexperienced makers.
This piece represents the power obtained from allowing the voice of the goddesses to reach one's heart.

The Lynnki Sit Bracelet is said to store and accumulate the power of its wearer and return it when necessary. This means that, unless the wearer is in a combat situation, it will be difficult to witness the effects of this bracelet. That said, it remains to be proven whether this makes any difference to actual combat performance.

This bracelet was made to help sacrifice the last elements maintaining the wearer's life to allow them to deliver one ultimately powerful blow. It all depends on whether the wearer's resistance is higher than the enemy's.
The red gems in this bracelet symbolize the blood of the enemy. The inner surface reads, "Never fear, only fight."

This bracelet inherited the style popular during the Kingdom's heydays. Contrary to its delicate appearance, this piece boasts very good resistance, a characteristic which it transfers into its wearer as well.
Wear it at a fancy chateau somewhere, you'll fit right in. Use to change your appearance.
The basic uniform given to low-rank mercenaries. Use to change your appearance.

More than protection, the attire of a gladiator is first and foremost about showmanship. A perfect armor decreases the enjoyment of the audience, which is why the Murmillo's covers only half of the body.
The cloth around the neck allows a Shinobi to cover their face when necessary. Doing so tells the adversary that they are a Shinobi without revealing their identity.

Fencers require costly, high-quality garments, as even those of humble origins are connected with the higher classes through education or war. The Hutton family has long promoted the use of official uniforms for lower-class Fencers, which resulted in the extravagant fashions of traditional Fencer clothing being all but eliminated. This helped boost the status of lower-class Fencers, and it was the first step towards popularizing the occupation.
Dragoons, often descendants of nobility, tend to dress in a slightly ostentatious fashion. This, of course, does not diminish their ability in combat.
Templars first started to wear the purple mantle as they began to separate themselves from the clergy by order of the empire. One could say the mantle is a symbol of royal authority over the church.
Lancer garments are made with a type of metallic fabric that can maintain a good degree of malleability.

Class garments are often adopted by the nobility for fashion purposes, regardless of their relation to the job. The same cannot be said for Sage clothing. Despite their trendy appearance, Sage clothes are produced with strong-smelling chemicals which, while helpful in keeping bookworms at bay, make the outfits unattractive to fashion-oriented folk.

Warlocks may not be the most popular class in the social sphere, but their presence has long been customary at all kinds of gatherings. Because of this, Warlock garments are purposely made to look appropriate for balls and formal parties.
Featherfoots originate from outside the kingdom and research on them is scarce. Because of this, little is known about the elements of their clothing.

Despite their light appearance, Runecaster garments are made to protect the wearer against the cold, while allowing for movement in warmer weather. This is a reflection of the climate in which Runecaster clothing is produced.
Enchanters tend to value efficiency and performance over appearance, which is why their clothing is often simple and unadorned.

Appraisers are known to be fond of comfortable clothing, although they tend to wear formal garments whenever they are required to contact with higher-class customers. This outfit is an example of that.
The thick material of Falconer clothes is resistant to the hawk's claws, while also protecting them from damage.
Cannoneer outfits were originally similar to typical blacksmith clothing. With time, however, the class gained a higher status and its attire began to look more elegant.
Today's Musketeer garb is an exact replica of the royal honor guard uniforms worn centuries ago. Curiously, the honor guard now wears a modern version of those uniforms.
The purpose of Mergen attire in its culture of origin continues to be unknown in the kingdom. So far, the Mergen Master has provided no clues to this mystery.

Chaplain clothing combines colors and elements symbolizing the goddesses to convey a sense of security to battling soldiers. Despite this, the philosophy behind Chaplain garments does not allow for their adaptation to real combat situations.
These garments are known to be highly resistant to dirt, allowing them to last for longer periods of time without washing. Not only that, they are designed for easy laundering.

Traditionally, the ornaments in Kabbalist clothing each represent a different academic achievement. However, the lack of enforcement of this custom by the current Kabbalist Master has made it so that even beginners have started to wear the ornaments freely.
The Inquisitor's stole was originally worn only in occasions of judgement. Today, with the goddesses disappeared, it is worn at all times to help propagate the Inquisitors' doctrine.
Taoist garments are reminiscent of the style based in past academic traditions.

Miko clothing reflects the traditions of its culture of origin, resulting in a visible contrast with the local fashions of the kingdom. With the emerging status of Mikos in society, their?style is also likely to influence future trends in the kingdom.

Masinios é um Wizard que viveu na era do Rei Frienel. Ele teve uma ideia muito singular, que era combinar o poder da magia com maquinismo, e este é um dos resultados desta aplicação. Esta espada é um produto que se aproxima dos últimos dias de vida dele, o que reflete este período de sua pesquisa.

- 1% de chance por inimigo ao redor, ao atacar eles e no máximo 10%, de receber o efeito [Espírito de Batalha]. Ao acumular o efeito 5 vezes, ativa o efeito [Modo de Batalha] por 10 segundos{nl} {nl}[Modo de Batalha]{nl} - Ataque Físico {img green_up_arrow 16 16}120{nl} - Taxa de Ataque em Área {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl} - Defesa Física {img red_down_arrow 16 16} 400{nl} - HP Máximo {img red_down_arrow 16 16}2.000

Como magia pode resolver vários problemas com facilidade, não havia necessidade de um mecanismo que transferisse forças físicas, feito engrenagens. Porém, Masinios estava preocupado com a ideia de transferir força mágica utilizando maquinismo. Foi assim que esta Espada de 2 Mãos foi criada logo no início das suas pesquisas. Só que, devido a este fato, o efeito mágico desta arma é um tanto quanto forte.
- 10% de chance, por habilidade de ataque, de receber o efeito de [Concentração Mental].{nl} {nl}[Concentração Mental]{nl} - SPR {img green_up_arrow 16 16}5{nl} - Acumula até 10 vezes
Para um equipamento feito pelo Masinios, possui uma aparência bem no estilo Wizard.
- 10% de chance, ao atacar, de reduzir a Resistência à Crítico em 10 por 5 segundos{nl} - Acumula até 20 vezes

Os rumores são grandes, mas quando este Arco foi revelado ao mundo, Lucid Winterspoon disse que teria sido melhor se o Masinios tivesse, de fato, experimentado combater como uma classe diferente e expandido o seu pensamento. Claro, isso não pode ser confirmado, afinal ela raramente responde perguntas sobre as pessoas que viveram na mesma era que seu passado.
- Nível das Habilidades de Quarrel Shooter {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl}  - Nível de [Running Shot] {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

Há um rumor de que vários Wizards que vieram após Masinios riram do fato dele não ser capaz de criar um método de produção incrível para a Besta, onde ele pudesse demonstrar a vantagem do maquinismo. Outro rumor é que Lucid Winterspoon reprimiu tais Wizards, fazendo com que fossem capazes de opinar somente se trabalhassem a teoria da magia ao menos na metade do nível que Masinios fez, além de manterem no mínimo duas posições de Mestre.
- 30% de chance de causar 2.000 de dano do elemento Raio

Uma arma que usa um cano físico para ampliar o poder mágico, no lugar de jóias que eram usadas pela maioria dos grandes Wizards daquela era. Essa foi uma decisão muito do estilo do Masinios, além de um produto dos seus primeiros dias de criação.

Este é o resultado da tentativa de aprimoramento da Maça feita pelo próprio Masinios. Devido ao fato da Maça de 2 Mãos ter uma performance completamente diferente da de 1 Mão, pode-se perceber que essa não era a intenção dele. Em vez disso, pode-se dizer que ele achava que estava tudo bem que esse desempenho fosse resultado de sua tentativa.
- Taxa de Bloqueio Final {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2% - 8% chance to reduce damage by {img red_down_arrow 16 16} 50% when hit

- Taxa de Bloqueio Final {img green_up_arrow 16 16}3%{nl} - Increases all Peltasta skill level by {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1 {nl}  -  Increases all Rodelero skill levels by  {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

Um Escudo feito baseado no pedido de um nobre anônimo, nos tempos do Masinios. Desde então, a receita era mantida em segredo mas, de acordo com a vontade do próprio Masinios, ela foi revelada para o mundo após a sua morte. Este processo foi comumente aplicado nos produtos que ele fez e que foram baseados em pedidos de diferentes nobres, os quais bancaram as suas pesquisas.
- 5% de chance, ao atacar, de causar dano adicional equivalente ao seu Dano Elemental: Raio * 10

Masinios estava tão obcecado pelo futuro do maquinismo que trocou seu nome para Masinios. Por causa disso, o seu nome verdadeiro foi enterrado e esquecido na escuridão da história, nunca mais revelado. Porém, esta Lança é feita com a receita que ele desenvolveu antes dessa troca de nome, portanto seu nome poderia ser localizado através do poder mágico deixado na receita. Como Masinios não é uma pessoa dos tempos antigos tão popular assim, ninguém pensou em realizar este processo.

- 10% de chance, ao atacar, de reduzir a Stamina em 1.5 e aplicar o efeito [Colisão]. [Colisão] mudará para [Choque de Colisão] se for acumulado 10 vezes dentro de 10 segundos. {nl} {nl} [Choque de Colisão]{nl} - Aplica o efeito de [Slow] por 10 segundos{nl} - Defesa Física {img red_down_arrow 16 16}800

É dito que esta Pique foi feita seguindo as necessidades de um certo nobre, quando Masinios não era mais pago pela Sociedade Mágica. Wizards daquele tempo não eram capazes de entender Masinios, que pesquisava maquinismo e poderia mal ser associado à pesquisa mágica.

De acordo com os rumores, dizem que a receita foi desenvolvida a pedido de um famoso Shinobi da época. Claro que, a partir da circunstância do Masinios, o maior motivo foi a obtenção de financiamento para a sua pesquisa.

Quando Masinios entendeu que os dispositivos instalados por Agailla Flurry na Mage Tower não operavam com poder mágico, mas sim pela coleção e acumulação de um certo poder, ele aplicou os mesmos princípios no Cajado, o que garantiu uma grande amplificação mágica, considerando os materiais e esforço que foram necessários.

When weapons were introduced in the kingdom, there were many directions for the development. With this weapon, the emphasis is on making it smaller, the convenience for consecutive shootings, and the satisfaction for design.
- Nível de [Full Metal Jacket] {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1{nl}  - Nível de [Limacon] {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1{nl}  - Nível de [Pistol Shot] {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1
A opinião sobre esta arma é que, enquanto Masinios entendeu magia e maquinismo, ele não entendeu a pólvora, por isso que as Pistolas foram feitas desta forma.

- 15% de chance, ao atacar, de receber o efeito [Afiação] por 5 segundos. Quando [Afiação] acumular 5 vezes, o seu próximo ataque básico causará 5 golpes.{nl} {nl}[Afiação]{nl} - Ataque Crítico {img green_up_arrow 16 16}60

Há razões conflitantes do por quê Masinios, sendo um Wizard, decidiu se dedicar ao maquinismo, mas uma teoria é de que isso é devido a penúltima Wizard, Agailla Flurry. Dizem que ele foi atraído pelo maquinismo devido a própria criação da Mage Tower por Flurry. É dito que este Florete foi feito durante um período em que Masinios favorecia a magia e considerava o maquinismo somente um hobby.
- Nível de [Sweeping Cannon] {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1{nl}  - Nível de [Bazooka] {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1

É uma opinião muito comum de que as engrenagens, incluindo as da Mage Tower, não são dispositivos que usam magia, mas sim que atraem um certo poder e coletam ele na torre. Masinios entendeu mal este ponto e se aprofundou na maquinaria, então as armas que ele inventou poderiam ter sido muito melhores, mas não são. Isso também se faz verdadeiro para o Canhão.
- 10% de chance, ao realizar um Ataque Crítico, de reduzir o Bloqueio do inimigo em 400
O Mosquete era algo completamente novo, projetado na segunda metade da vida do Masinios. É considerado um sucesso entre suas tentativas de combinar magia e maquinismo.

It is said to be a mirror used in ceremonies and rituals as the sacred material of the Goddess Jurate sealed by the Asmodians. It is clouded by evil aura.
The sacred treasure of Jurate that tradition person Ugnius had. It was said that it was a necklace worn by a priest who conducted rituals and ordinances.
The Second Earthen of Jurate. Although the Asmodians sealed it, it is a mirror that was used in rituals and rituals as a sanctuary that washes away the demonic energy with the aura of the sea.
Luxuriously decorated water. They are said to be water bottles containing water for purification Ritual. The traitor, Ugnius, went to Letave Plateau and asked him to fill up the water of the sea.
Blue moss. It is said to be used for ritual burning after being dried.

A Companion Voucher obtained as an Adventure Journal Reward. Collect 20 and exchange them for an Armadillo Companion at the Wings of Vaivora.
A relic containing the spirits of the Nak Muay Master's mentors. Use to check your distance from the Nak Muay Master.
Essence obtained from a Red Meduja. It can be used to help spirits approach earthly objects.
Bright Ellom bells are a special kind of Ellom bells modified by the power of a spirit. They have the ability to cure ailments in departed spirits.
A little house sculpted by Tesla. It was made to soothe a homesick spirit.
A dandelion flower grown at the Inner Enceinte District. Despite the arid environment, it developed very well.
Spores from an Inner Enceinte District dandelion.
A box discovered around a tomb. It feels like it's full of something.
A letter discovered inside the box. Someone wrote it to confess their feelings to a special person.
Stonecrops from Akmens Ridge. They symbolize a girl's love.
Statice from Cranto Coast. They represent eternal love.
A small treat made to soothe a spirit with a sweet tooth.
A gift from Iona to appease a departed spirit.

A common leather bracelet adorned with a flower trinket.
A bracelet decorated with colorful designs. The patterns were in fashion at the time the bracelet was created.
Originally a pearl bracelet, the central ornament was changed to produce different effetcs. Now, this bracelet's offensive properties are known to tire the wearer.
This bracelet reflects the efforts of its makers to achieve a balanced performance through the use of a stable gem.

Product of countless experiments, this bracelet has been improved over time to produce the best results. Improving it any further would require a large amount of resources, which is why it hasn't been experimented on for some time.
A bracelet made of mixed materials, said to improve mental clarity. Many of its wearers have experienced deeper states of meditation.

Hair accessory given to participants of the 2017 G-STAR.

You can wear the crown lopsided and pretend to be a tired king. Just don't try to impersonate an actual king, unless you want to get arrested.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
Golden brown, fresh out of the toaster. Too bad you can't eat it.{nl}But you can exchange it for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
An imaginative crown made from a gigantic red pudding.
A pair of wings created by to the image of Giltine's. Unfortunately, they don't let you fly.

A red bookmark given by the Sage Master. It emits a faint but interesting energy. Collection item.
An orange bookmark given by the Sage Master. It emits a faint but interesting energy. Collection item.
A yellow bookmark given by the Sage Master. It emits a faint but interesting energy. Collection item.
A green bookmark given by the Sage Master. It emits a faint but interesting energy. Collection item.
A blue bookmark given by the Sage Master. It emits a faint but interesting energy. Collection item.
An indigo bookmark given by the Sage Master. It emits a faint but interesting energy. Collection item.
A violet bookmark given by the Sage Master. It emits a faint but interesting energy. Collection item.
A piece of shiny silver-like mineral. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.

In the early days of the Kingdom, this precious ore could not be mined without the blessing of a goddess. Nowadays, it's not that difficult. This piece is small enough to fit in a box. Collection item.
Fragment of a green stone. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.
This stone is a mix of many colors. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.
Though red like a ruby stone, this mineral isn't as scarce. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.
Fragment of a black translucent stone. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.
A green precious stone, known in legends to protect humans from evil spirits. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.
Fragment of a brown precious stone. It's too small to be used in crafting, but it fits just right in a modest treasure box. Collection item.
A handful of common weeds brought by Dexter the cat. From the teeth marks, he seems to have ripped them off with his mouth. Collection item.
A mallet brought by Dexter the cat. It looks like it was used for a long time. Where in the goddesses' realm did Dexter get this?
A small fish brought by Dexter the cat. It must have been caught just now, it's still jumping about. Does Dexter go fishing? Collection item.
A rusty screw brought by Dexter the cat. It's pretty rusty all over. Dexter's owner should be worried that his cat was carrying this in his mouth. Collection item.
An unripe apple brought by Dexter the cat. It's going to be a couple of days until it's good to eat. Collection item.
Torn pieces of wood brought by Dexter the cat. They are quite small, enough to be carried by Dexter with his mouth. Collection item.
A knife brought by Dexter the cat. It looks worn out and unkempt. Someone should really teach Dexter not to bring home such dangerous things. Collection item.
A Dimensional Search Scroll given by Kupole Rugile. Use it to check the dimensional crack that is being invaded by the demons. Collection item.
A crystallized fragment of a distorted dimension. It radiates light in many different colors. Collection item.
A core containing demonic energy. Kupole Danute used this with the Dimensional Essence to create protection crystals. Collection item.
A source of magic used to charge the Flicid Collapsing Device. Collection item.
A glowing tool dropped by a Carapace. The beads embedded in the center are shining with bright blue light. Collection item.
A match, the kind provided by supply soldiers. Used for various purposes. Collection item.
This arrow was found in a demon that fought Leonardas in a fierce battle. Collection item.
Leaves that grow from Lily Velly and Jelly Velly monsters. They look moist, as if they were just watered. Collection item.
It looks like it was just cut off, but at the same time it's wet with water from the lake and it emits a mysterious energy. Collection item.
A water bottle, like those distributed by supply soldiers. It looks rusty in some places, so it probably doesn't belong to Leonardas. Collection item.

This Belorb is a copy produced by the Magic Association which, despite looking similar to original Belorbs, does not possess the full extent of their power.{nl}Belorbs were once divine objects kept by demons and goddesses. In fact, the outbreak of the Divine Tree occurred when demons interrupted their supply of Belorbs, which the Tree requires in order to function.

The magic extracted from ferns can be made to possess either light seeking or shunning characteristics. However, due to cost and practicality reasons, it is made to resist darkness even if it is theoretically possible to make it resist light.

Some wizards tried but have failed to find if the new appearance of magical items in the Allerno region is due to the demons. Items that resist darkness such as this are proof that the theory is unlikely.

To excite the spectators for the main attraction is a role fit for gladiators who have less experience in the arena.

Dragons can be biologically classified by how magic affects them. For one, it's been proven that dragons belong in the same broad category as Beast type monsters, due to how similarly they react to specific types of magic.

- 5% chance to inflict [Bleeding] on enemies for 30 seconds every 1.5 seconds when using Shark Cutter{nl} - A basic attack will hit 5 successive times every 5 times you apply [Bleeding] to enemies{nl} - {img red_down_arrow 16 16} 50% reduced damage of [Ghost] armor-type targets

Dragons have been known to store the divine vital force they find spread throughout the world in their bodies, in the hopes of gathering the power to defy future goddesses. That vital force, however, can also be used by humans to produce weapons. An example of that is Teliavelis' gear series, where the designs take inspiration from dragons.

Some speculate that goddesses like Austeja are for the preservation of dragons as a means to provide some kind of security for humans in the future. Teliavelis, on the other hand, believes that it is simply a proof of the goddesses' respect for all living creatures.

It is said that those who are spiritually sensitive can discern the energy of both goddesses and dragons in this weapon. The combination of such contrasting powers remains forever unfamiliar to those who experience it.

Many artisans believe they can produce Velcoffer equipment from regular materials. However, Teliavelis has shown that it takes a talented blacksmith to be able to handle materials containing the power of the goddesses.
- Increases all Quarrel Shooter skill levels by {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl} - Increases skill level of Running Shot by {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1
- Increases Running Shot skill level {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1
- Increases all Quarrel Shooter skill levels by {img green_up_arrow 16 16}2{nl} - Increases skill level of Running Shot by {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1
This weapon is produced with real dragon scales, although one knows for sure how Teliavelis obtains them.

Teliavelis is the only blacksmith known to have mastered the technique required to quickly solidify metal components. Some believe he uses the intense cooling properties of dragons when casting the metal.
Although its handle is made of metal, this weapon produces no unwanted vibration when hitting the target. You could say that it is proof of Teliavelis' extraordinary talent.

According to a recently uncovered Exorcist report, after its design was initially revealed, this shield caught the attention of several high-ranking demons. Realistically, of course, it is highly unlikely that any of them will ever possess one.

Some artisans and wizards suspect that Teliavelis may have gotten the Velcoffer Spear and Pike designs confused when crafting this weapon. The difference is merely visual, however, as it doesn't affect the weapons' performance.
- Deals {img green_up_arrow 16 16}235 additional damage when using [Impaler]
The ornaments may resemble a pair of wings, but this weapon is not intended to be thrown over long distances.
Some believe that the blade is made not from metal, but dragon bone. Unfortunately, dragon bones are a rare material, making this claim almost impossible to confirm.
- 20% chance of dealing additional Fire property damage equal to 33% of your character level for 10 sec when using Hell Breath.
Teliavelis hopes this weapon will once become a symbol of victory over the dragons for humans and goddesses.
After the reappearance of dragons, Flint Winterwood is said to be researching new ways to create stronger, heat-resistant weapons by using dragon materials.
Despite its design, this sword provides decent protection to both hands and wrists. Some users, however, say that holding it can feel like touching the inside of a dragon's mouth.

Recently, the Cannoneer Master has announced her opposition to the use of this weapon for military purposes. She firmly believes that the Royal Army should not mass-produce rare weapons like this one.

Experts who have used this weapon tend to have a good impression of it. Its only flaw, they say, is that it can be hard to clean without getting injured. Fortunately, at least, it doesn't seem to backfire any sparks when used.
Surprisingly, the Velcoffer Robe is the most difficult piece to produce out of the entire Velcoffer gear series. This is because the robe is made from very delicate materials.

Many believe, mistakenly, that Velcoffer equipment is made with dragon leather. While it is true that Teliavelis uses dragon materials in his gear, this piece does not include any dragon leather components.

One legend says that Froster Lord used the power of Giltine to freeze over the world of the dragons a long time ago. Such strong magic can only be undone if Giltine herself allows her powers to be used again.
Some say that Teliavelis has several ideas ready for future gear series, ideas no one has ever thought of before. Apparently, he is just waiting for the right time to reveal them.

According to Teliavelis, after Medzio Diena the magic used to enhance equipment items has been irreversibly changed. Therefore, in his gear he prefers to focus on the performance, leaving the magic components open to more diverse setups.

According to legends, the most powerful dragons are still alive in the dragon world. As long as their realm is dominated by the Froster Lord, however, the dragons will remain trapped there, unable to escape.
Although they maintain their traditional style to this day, the original Sausis boots were unimaginably faster.
One legend says that Velcoffer originally worked as a guard for an even stronger dragon. Whether that was true or not, the dragon he was said to work for is no longer alive.

A few Class Masters believe that, if Teliavelis was involved in producing equipment for the goddesses, that could constitute proof that he is part of the Amzinas. The other Amzinas, however, have never confirmed whether that is true or simply a rumor.

No one knows for sure if there are other dragons besides Boruta and Velcoffer roaming our world, but the possibility is there. Especially after Medzio Diena, these creatures have had more opportunities than ever to escape their confinement.

While many consider Teliavelis a great craftsman, some believe that there is something more to his originality. It is thought that his pieces were designed with the wisdom of the goddesses, and that he is merely their maker and conveyer.

Sometimes, finished pieces of Velcoffer gear are found in our world. Strangely enough, they don't seem to have been made by humans, which has led magic Class Masters to assume that the goddesses possessed the original versions of Teliavelis' items.
Legends tell that one powerful dragon named Boruta crossed over to our world a long time ago. They say that, compared to him, Velcoffer is still a relatively young dragon.

Use to hold a festival balloon. Will be deleted at the end of the event.

A teeny tiny pink hat for a teeny tiny fairy.

A pair of wings for a teeny fairy. Unfortunately, they don't let you fly.{nl} Can be exchanged for medals.

This lira is said to produce beautiful tones that almost sound golden. It can be very hard to play, however, so we advise that you only pose with it.
Early in the day is when this lira sounds the most magical. It can be very hard to play, however, so we advise that you only pose with it.
This is the style of trumpet most often played by little fairies. Give it a try!
Profess your innocent love with a timeless pink rose.

Go, Unicorns! Use to change your appearance.

An outfit given to beginners who show some level of talent during training. These Pied Pipers are at least able to influence and capture animals. Of course, this outfit also commemorates a special moment for Pied Pipers.
As a Pied Piper, influencing minds is an important task. Those who have mastered this art are more than qualified to wear this costume.
An outfit that makes reference to a very famous scene in Pied Piper lore. It is said that the Pied Piper enticed the children with candy and persuaded them to follow along.

It is said that truly legendary Pied Pipers can move even mountains to dance and follow along. There has yet to be such a person, but Pied Pipers with extraordinary skills are handed down this outfit.
Exorciser is a term describing a beginner Exorcist. It used to refer to a shaman before the establishment of the Kingdom and now it is embroidered on the garments of the Exorcists.

On becoming an Exorcist of the highest expertise, one learns that the true meaning of the term Exorcist is "The Oath of the Soul Binder". This costume is bestowed upon those who have learned this true meaning.
The scrolls of rituals used during an exorcism are written in crimson ink. The design of this costume was inspired by the color of the exorcism scrolls.

A long time ago, the Royal Family granted Exorcists judicial power when a possession was identified to be genuine. This costume was created in celebration of that moment in history and the Exorcist Master who mediated such an outcome. Only those wearing this costume will be granted judicial power by law.
Changes your appearance and effects when equipped.{nl}- Changes Skyliner visual effects.

This item is a symbol of the Exorcist's faith. Those who carry the beacon on their backs have vowed to shine their light on the world even if they end up crucified. Story is told of a famous Exorcist who destroyed all demons within the vicinity of the beacon by allowing himself to be crucified. But, of course, there are few demons who will equal in power to an Exorcist who carries the beacon on their back.
This costume is given to those who have honored the Piped Piper name with exceptional bursts of creativity. Those who wear the costume become the envy of other Pied Pipers and bards alike.
Healthy food for your Penguin. Restores all of the HP and +15 Stamina.{nl}Good for:{nl} - Penguin{nl} - Pengmarine{nl} - Winter Penguin{nl} - Leaf Penguin

The Oracle Master built many gadgets in order to release the life force of monsters that accumulated over time in the Other Dimension, of which the Dimensional Incense Burner is one.{nl} {nl}Using the Dimensional Incense Burner will grant you and those around you many beneficial effects.
Restores 1234 HP and 617 SP every 2 seconds. {nl}224 HP and SP are restored over 15 seconds. {nl}Right-click to use. Cooldown 100 seconds.

When given the sacks, Waltas will make bombs and Nagles will build defensive systems. It can also be used to repair damaged boxes or buildings. Use the sacks to load the ballista and turrets with missiles.

The cure for mental illness blessed by the Priest Master. It is quietly glowing.

column3: 별의 탑을 향하여 이벤트 참여자에게 지급되는 암밴드입니다.

Empty_helmet: This piece of equipment disappeared along with Nicopolis at the time of the experiment. Then, with the influence of Medzio Diena, it somehow found its way back into our world. It is said to have reappeared near the Starlit Lake because of the magic rituals Pbeta executed in order to defeat Solcomm there.
column3: 이 장비는 니코폴리스가 마법 실험으로 사라졌을 때 함께 사라졌습니다. 그런데 신수의 날이 세상에 영향을 끼치자 우리 세계로 돌아오기 시작했습니다. 니코폴리스가 사라질 당시 유통되던 지역에서 다시 나타나는데 별깃든 호수 지역에 나타나는 이유는 프베타가 솔콤을 몰아내면서 행한 마법의식에 이끌렸기 때문이라고 합니다.

Empty_helmet: One of the reasons why the Owyn family is active in the region of Nicopolis is the strange reappearance of old weapons that were thought to have vanished along with the city. After studying the returned weapons, Owynia Dilben sought the help of the Bullet Marker Master to produce new copies of the equipment. Curiously, however, until they gain a proper owner, the newly-created weapons seem to disappear and reappear at random times.
column3: 오윈 딜벤이 니코폴리스에 일족의 사람을 파견한 이유는 여러가지이지만, 그 중 하나는 니코폴리스가 사라졌을 때 같이 사라진 장비들이 우리 세상으로 돌아오는 현상입니다. 오위니아 딜벤은 받은 임무로 만족하지 않고 돌아온 무기들을 연구한 후, 이 일에 불릿 마커 마스터를 끌어들여 그가 새로운 무기를 만들어내는 데 일조하였습니다. 다만 한 가지 문제가 있는데 이렇게 만들어진 무기는 진정한 주인을 만나기 전에는 제 맘대로 나타났다가 사라집니다

Empty_helmet: One of the reasons why the Owyn family is active in the region of Nicopolis is the strange reappearance of old weapons that were thought to have vanished along with the city. After studying the returned weapons, Owynia Dilben sought the help of the Bullet Marker Master to produce new copies of the equipment. Curiously, however, until they gain a proper owner, the newly-created weapons seem to disappear and reappear at random times.
column3: 오윈 딜벤이 니코폴리스에 일족의 사람을 파견한 이유는 여러가지이지만, 그 중 하나는 니코폴리스가 사라졌을 때 같이 사라진 장비들이 우리 세상으로 돌아오는 현상입니다. 오위니아 딜벤은 받은 임무로 만족하지 않고 돌아온 무기들을 연구한 후, 이 일에 불릿 마커 마스터를 끌어들여 그가 새로운 무기를 만들어내는 데 일조하였습니다. 다만 한 가지 문제가 있는데 이렇게 만들어진 무기는 진정한 주인을 만나기 전에는 제 맘대로 나타났다가 사라집니다

column3: - 공격 시 5% 확률로 적에게 10초간 1초당 최소 마법 공격력의 16%의 불 속성 추가 대미지 주는 효과가 발생합니다.
column5: - 5% chance to inflict [Burn] on an enemy for 10 seconds, with each second dealing damage equal to 60% of your magic attack
column6: - 공격 시 5% 확률로 적에게 10초간 1초당 최소 마법 공격력의 16%의 대미지를 주는 화염 효과 발생

column6: - 최종블럭률 {img green_up_arrow 16 16}1% {nl} - 피격 시 1% 확률로 5초 동안 1초 간격으로 HP 40회복 효과 발생

Empty_helmet: Among the old Nicopolis items that have reappeared after Medzio Diena, many are weapons, but armor items are relatively rare. There is no telling where the people who wore these items disappeared to, but some seem to have left behind their clothing.
column3: 니코폴리스에서 사라졌다 수백 년 만에 돌아온 장비 중에 무기류는 새 것인 경우가 많지만, 의류는 그렇지 않은 경우가 많습니다. 이들 장비를 입고 있던 사람들은 어디로 갔는지 알 수 없는데 그들이 남긴 옷만이 돌아온 셈입니다.

Empty_helmet: Among the old Nicopolis items that have reappeared after Medzio Diena, many are weapons, but armor items are relatively rare. There is no telling where the people who wore these items disappeared to, but some seem to have left behind their clothing.
column3: 니코폴리스에서 사라졌다 수백 년 만에 돌아온 장비 중에 무기류는 새 것인 경우가 많지만, 의류는 그렇지 않은 경우가 많습니다. 이들 장비를 입고 있던 사람들은 어디로 갔는지 알 수 없는데 그들이 남긴 옷만이 돌아온 셈입니다.

column5: Sausis Leather Boots
column6: 사우시스의 레더 부츠

Empty_helmet: - 10% chance of inflicting the Curse of Sausis debuff.{nl}Cooldown 10 sec{nl}{nl}Curse of Sausis{nl}- Reduces the target's movement speed by 10 and critical resistance by 100.
column3: - 10%확률로 사우시스 저주 디버프를 부여합니다.{nl} 재사용 대기시간: 10초 {nl} {nl}사우시스의 저주 {nl} - 저주에 걸릴 경우 이동속도 10, 치명타 저항 100이 감소합니다.

Empty_helmet: This style of gloves is thought to have been worn by Sausis. His frost powers are known to be virtually insuperable.
column3: 사우시스가 사용하던 것으로 추정되는 장갑입니다. 그의 냉기는 쉽게 범접 할 수 없다고 알려져 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: A necklace created by the Class Masters who are working to maintain secrecy in the Astral Tower resistance army. Its magic values have been kept intentionally low, as overly powerful equipment can reveal the social status of both the wearer and the sponsor.
column3: 별의 탑 저항군을 지원하기 위헤 비밀리에 뜻을 같이하고 협력한 마스터들이 공을 들여 만든 목걸이입니다. 다만 지나치게 강력한 장비는 제작자와 제작을 후원한 사람들의 신분을 드러낼 우려가 있어서 일부러 마법부여의 수치는 낮추었다고 합니다.

Empty_helmet: This necklace has its own name engraved on the back. Many believe that the Linker Master engraved the words in an ambiguous manner so as to both reveal her identity and leave room for speculation.
column3: 뒷면에 제작자가 지은 목걸이의 이름이 새겨져 있습니다. 사람들은 링커 마스터가 고의로 목걸이에 새겨진 글자를 애매모호하게 써서 자신을 드러내는 한편 부인할 근거도 마련했다고 생각합니다.

Empty_helmet: Engraved here as several sets of initials which could be interpreted as the names of current Masters connected to the Astral Tower.
column3: 어쩌면 별의 탑과 직간접으로 관련이 있는 현직 마스터들 이름의 약자로 해석할 수도 있는 글자들이 여럿 새겨져 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: No one knows for sure who the original owner of this necklace was. According to a famous anecdote, they became frustrated after several failed attempts at tweaking its properties and ultimately decided to sell it.
column3: 이 목걸이의 주인이 누구인지는 알지 못하지만, 일화는 유명합니다. 가공에 가공을 거쳐 수많은 돈을 쏟아부었지만 결국 한계를 느끼고 목걸이를 팔았다고 합니다.

Empty_helmet: The owner of this necklace attacked their enemy from behind and disappeared without a trace. No one saw who they were, or what they looked like.
column3: 이 목걸이의 주인을 본 사람은 아무도 없다고 합니다. 뒤에서 막을 수 없는 공격을 선보이고 사라졌기 때문입니다.

Empty_helmet: - Quando usado, previne que suas invocações sejam empurradas.
The summons walked forward, mighty and powerful. The sight was akin to that of an enormous army advancing.
column3: 전장의 소환수들은 강건하게 전진했습니다. 그 모습은 마치 거대한 군단이 움직이는 것과 같았다고 합니다.

Empty_helmet: A bracelet left behind by the Himil family at the time they separated from the Schaffenstar. The family later realized their mistake, but being in the possession of the bracelet's recipe, they did not demand to have it returned. It is said that the Schaffenstar themselves were unaware of the bracelet's whereabouts for a long time.
column3: 히밀 가문이 샤펜스타에서 독립할 때 미쳐 챙기지 못한 팔찌입니다. 히밀 가문은 나중에 자신들이 빠뜨린 사실을 알았으나 제조법을 알고 있기에 반환 요구를 한 적은 없습니다. 그런데 샤펜스타에서도 오랜 기간 이 팔찌가 어디 있는지 모르고 있었다고 합니다.

Empty_helmet: Lydia Schaffen used many accessories throughout her lifetime, some of which have since been divided and reconstructed. This bracelet is one of such accessories.
column3: 리디아 샤펜은 평생 동안 여러 장신구를 사용하였고, 그 중 일부는 후대에 분해되어 재가공되기도 하였습니다. 이 팔찌도 그 가운데 하나입니다.

Empty_helmet: Although they were rare, the Schaffenstar is known to have had its heretics, meaning those who wished to free themselves from the shadow of Lydia Schaffen. These people never managed to make much of an impact, but recently some of their remaining objects were put to use by Elder Adaux.
column3: 샤펜스타의 오랜 역사에는 드물긴 하지만 이단자도 존재합니다. 리디아 새펜의 그늘에서 벗어나야 한다고 주장하는 사람들 말입니다. 이런 자들은 반향을 남기지 못하고 사라졌지만, 그들이 남긴 물품은 남아있다가 최근 아다욱스 장로에 의해 사용되었습니다.

Empty_helmet: Be careful not to injure yourself with the sharp metal parts. The identity of the owner of this bracelet remains unknown.
column3: 날카로운 철 조각에 찔리지 않도록 조심하세요. 이 브레이슬릿은 주인이 누구인지 알지 못합니다.

Empty_helmet: There is no escape from a powerful attack. One blow is all it takes.
column3: 한 번의 강력한 공격 후속 공격은 없습니다. 당신은 막지 못할 테니까요.

Empty_helmet: The owner of this bracelet was fully invested in their summons. The bracelet is a result of their incessant efforts.
column3: 브레이슬릿의 주인은 소환수를 너무나 아낀 나머지 자신의 모든 것을 공유하고자 했습니다. 그 결과 이 브레이슬릿이 탄생했습니다.

Empty_helmet: A costume invoking the daring, boyish spirit of the rook. Use to change your appearance.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 체스 말 중 룩을 키 포인트로 활용한, 체스 콘셉트 코스튬입니다. 착용하면 외형이 변경됩니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: For valiant pawns, there's nowhere to go but forward. Use to change your appearance.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 체스 말 중 폰을 키 포인트로 활용한, 체스 콘셉트 코스튬입니다. 착용하면 외형이 변경됩니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

column3: 체스 말 중 나이트를 키 포인트로 활용한, 체스 콘셉트 코스튬입니다. 착용하면 외형이 변경됩니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: Cautious but unafraid, the king makes his move. Use to change your appearance.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 체스 말 중 킹을 키 포인트로 활용한, 체스 콘셉트 코스튬입니다. 착용하면 외형이 변경됩니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: A king cannot be complete without his crown.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 체스에서 가장 중요한 킹을 활용한 왕관입니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: The elevated crown denotes the queen's power and status.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 체스에서 가장 강력한 퀸을 활용한 왕관입니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: A unique fedora designed around the chess bishop motif.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 체스 말인 비숍을 장식으로 사용한 페도라입니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: Turn yourself into an impressive human chess piece with this accessory.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 체스 말인 나이트를 그대로 본뜬 헤어 액세서리입니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: A helmet accessory made to look like the armor worn by ancient knights.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 전쟁터에 나가는 기사들의 말을 형상화한 투구입니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: The chessboard is much more than part of game; it is a true battlefield.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 체스판은 단순한 격나무늬판이지만, 킹 즉 왕국을 지키는 전쟁을 하는 전쟁터와 같습니다.{nl}이러한 체스판을 활용한 모자입니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: Turn yourself into an impressive human chess piece with this accessory.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 체스 말인 룩을 그대로 본뜬 헤어 액세서리입니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: This exquisite hair accessory is what experts refer to as a "bow". Impressive, isn't it?{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 머리에 착용하는 큰 리본 장식입니다. 머나먼 이국에서는 이러한 리본 장식을 헤어 보우 혹은 보우라 부릅니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.
column5: Connoisseurs often get into disputes regarding the cuteness factor of a straight ear versus a folded ear.
column6: 호사가들은 펴진 토끼귀와 굽어있는 토끼귀중에 어느것이 더 귀여운지 논쟁을 벌이곤 합니다.

Empty_helmet: This exquisite hair accessory is what experts refer to as a "bow". This one in particular is a rather large specimen.{nl}Can be exchanged for medals at the Loja de Trocas.
column3: 머리에 착용하는 매우 큰 리본 장식입니다. 머나먼 이국에서는 이러한 리본 장식을 헤어 보우 혹은 보우라 부릅니다.{nl}리사이클샵에서 메달로 교환할 수 있습니다.

Empty_helmet: Got flower petals... on my head... sigh... just leave them there...
column3: 벚꽃잎이 머리에.... 떨어졌다.. 귀찮다.. 그냥 두기로 하자..

Empty_helmet: Which color do you think is tastier? They're all mine, mind you, but I'll let you choose.
column3: 어떤 색깔이 맛있을까요. 고르기만 하세요.. 모두 제 것 입니다.

Empty_helmet: Tic, toc, tic, toc. I'm a chess timer.{nl}Cooldown 5 sec.{nl}Time will not wait for you...

Empty_helmet: Increases your character's class level to Level 15 of Rank 10. Can only be used on Rank 10 characters. Right-click to use.

Empty_helmet: Activate your Fire Enchant Rounds to increase the critical rate of your next attack. Consumes Fire Enchant Round x1 every time the effects are activated. Right-click to activate.
column3: 불 인챈트탄을 활성화하여 공격 시 치명타 발생 확률을 증가시킵니다. 효과가 발동할 때마다 불 인챈트탄이 1개씩 소비됩니다. 마우스 오른쪽 클릭으로 활성화시킵니다.

Empty_helmet: Activate your Ice Enchant Rounds to reduce the damage you receive from enemies. Consumes Ice Enchant Round x1 every time the effects are activated. Right-click to activate.
column3: 얼음 인챈트탄을 활성화하여 자신이 받는 대미지를 감소시킵니다. 효과가 발동할 때마다 얼음 인챈트탄이 1개씩 소비됩니다. 마우스 오른쪽 클릭으로 활성화시킵니다.

column5: Shining Golden Anvil
column6: [결속] 빛나는 황금 모루

Empty_helmet: Can only be used on equipment with 1 Potential. The equipment won't be destroyed upon failure. Does not require a silver fee for enhancement. When you fail at an enhancement level of +12 or higher, it will reduce to +10.{nl}Will be automatically deleted at the end of the event period.
column3: 포텐셜이 0인 장비에만 사용가능 하며, 실패해도 장비가 파괴되지 않습니다. 강화시 실버가 필요하지 않습니다. 실패시 강화수치가 1 감소하며, +12 강화 이상에서 실패 시 강화 수치가 +10 강화로 감소합니다. 마우스 오른쪽 클릭으로 사용합니다.{nl}9월 13일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.
column5: This item can only be used on equipment with 0 Potential. The item will not be destroyed if an enhancement attempt fails, but its enhancement level will be reduced by 1. When you fail with an item enhanced to +12 or higher, the enhancement level will be reduced to +10. Right-click to use.{nl}This item will be removed at the end of the event period.
column6: 포텐셜이 0인 장비에만 사용가능 하며, 실패해도 장비가 파괴되지 않습니다. 실패시 강화수치가 1 감소하며, +12 강화 이상에서 실패 시 강화 수치가 +10 강화로 감소합니다. 마우스 오른쪽 클릭으로 사용합니다.{nl}7월 12일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Astral Tower Hero Costume Selection Box
A box containing Male and Female Astral Tower Hero Costumes. Right-click to use and select a costume.{nl}Will be automatically deleted at the end of the event period.
column3: 별의 탑 영웅 코스튬이 들어있는 상자입니다. 마우스 오른쪽 버튼 클릭으로 사용합니다.{nl}8월 9일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Este fragmento ajudará você a redefinir sua build após a chegada do Rank 10. Será excluído automaticamente no final do período do evento.
column3: 10랭크 업데이트를 맞이해 랭크 초기화를 도와드릴 별의 조각이 떨어졌습니다. 8월 16일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: This invitation will help you level up. Will be automatically deleted at the end of the event period.
column3: 레벨업을 도와드리는 우스카의 초대장이 도착했습니다.{nl}클라페다의 우스카를 찾아가 초대장을 보여주세요.{nl}9월 13일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Select the equipment you want to receive from the list.{nl}Will be automatically deleted at the end of the event period.
column3: 사용 시 리스트 중 원하시는 장비가 지급됩니다.{nl}9월 13일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Win up to 10,000 Attribute Points!{nl}Can be used by characters of level 50 and above.{nl}Will be automatically deleted at the end of the event period.
column3: [For 10] 10만 넥슨캐시와 최대 10만 특성포인트 획득 찬스!{nl}50레벨 이상일 때 사용할 수 있습니다.{nl}8월 16일 점검 시, 일괄 삭제됩니다.

Empty_helmet: Title given to players selected for the monthly BEST event.
column3: 월간 BEST 건의 선정자에게 주어지는 칭호
